<em>Using software tools to browse the Web.</em>
<p>The 'Navigation' competency is made up of the following skills:</p>

*  [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/Navigation/Recognising-the-visual-Cues Recognising the visual cues in everyday Web services]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/Navigation/Installing-browser-add-ons Installing browser add-ons and extensions to provide additional functionality]
